page.title: 02Arts & Crafts Priors Marston
page.content: Most{Arts & Crafts}practised in Priors Marston are hobbies or leisure time pursuits; but some form a{cottage {industry}providing additional family income, such as - Dressmaking, Carpentry, Furniture Renovation, Curtain & Cushion Making, Upholstery & Soft Furnishings. Many crafts are self-taught from books or have been learned at adult education courses. A weekly{Craft {Class,}initially organised through the Women's Institute but now run by Warwickshire County Council, has been in operation in the Village Hall for 3 years. It has been well attended by women in the village and a variety of crafts have been taught - Patchwork, Quilting, Tapestry, Canvas Embroidery, Upholstery, Lampshade Making.
